summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5945 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Laurelhurst Crest, being the alley bounded by West Laurel Drive, East Laurel Drive, East 45th Street, 53rd Avenue Northeast and 54th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79010, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
